title: Drawing, "Capri, The Southern Coast and The Faraglione", ca. 1865
medium: Brush and gray wash, possibly charcoal, over graphite on off-white wove paper
signed: Signed in brush ? and wash, lower left: Wm S. Haseltine
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, on rocks, center right: red[d]ish grey/yellow
[see curtorial remarks for possible verso inscription].
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Roger H. Plowden (Mrs. Helen Haseltine Plowden)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Helen Haseltine Plowden
description: Horizontal view of the rocky coast and sea with large rocks in lower left foreground leading to larger outcroppings in the middle distance, tapering off in the background, as a rowboat, at center, containing three figures, moves shoreward, where boats beach near dwellings, at center left  of middleground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Capri, The Southern Coast and The Faraglione", ca. 1865.
ca. 1865. Brush and gray wash, possibly charcoal, over graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of Mrs. Helen Haseltine Plowden. 1953-155-1.
